name: Pokemon Abyssal Blue
description:
Explore a New & hostile Pokémon region in this Pokemon fan game!

Hello and thank you for your intressed. This is a pokemon fan game made by myself using pokemon essentials. i m making this on my off times between jobs and will probably update every time i reach some kind of mile stone in its developement.

Content so far: 

2 Gym badges 

A minor plot hook

gamplay to play till about level 30

A type rebalance 

A brand new  typing

and 2 new self made  pokemon form and evolution.

New pokeballs(art and animation by my brother)

The game is made with my vision of how i would like a pokemon game to be and the skills i  learn along the way so hopfully the content gets better as i slowly master pokemon essentials.

Disclamer:

 i have dyslexia  gramar and ortographe mistakes are to be expected, some of them might be voluntary as a pathetic attempt at humor and conveing voice through text. 

The game isnt fully polished( and probably will never be) as i am developping it and am prioritizing  fonctionnal game play over prestin grafic grace. Black out of bounds borders  are to be found a bit every were.

I dont own any nintendo licence only a bit of glue a smudge of offbrand paint out of witch a made my art(moua moua chefs kiss)

Wow you are still here you must be hooked enjoy the game<3
